name: Heather is Asleep
description:
Heather is Asleep is a horror game.

In this game, we test out the concept of Lucid dreaming/ waking up in the same dream and the "pinching"-mechanic to wake up. 

This game was a school assignment where we had to make a horror game. We at Spooky Club 123 wanted to play around with the theme of dreams and in the end, came up with this idea. Created in one week, we made three rooms to test our mechanics as well as the environment/ feel. 

Hope you enjoy our game and any feedback would be appreciated!

and remember to... wake up.

(PS. The game will close itself when you finish it!!)
